name: createEmojiPicker
title: Emoji Picker Builder
oneLiner: Reactive emoji aggregator from user preferences and specified pubkeys with NIP-30 custom emoji support

parameters.name: defaults
parameters.description: Default emojis to show at the end if no user preferences

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Array of pubkeys to aggregate emojis from (sorted by frequency)

returns.name: emojis
returns.description: Aggregated and deduplicated emoji list with emoji character, optional shortcode, and optional URL for custom emojis
